messages.content: What operating systems is ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor currently supported on?
ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor currently only supports NVIDIA operating systems.
What are the recommended functions for inpainting tasks?
For inpainting tasks, it's recommended to use the 'outpaint' function.
What is the recommended controlnet end percentage for obtaining good results when inpainting drawings?
The recommended controlnet end percentage for obtaining good results when inpainting drawings is 0.7-0.8.
What are the installation options available for ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor?
Users can install ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor through the ComfyUI Manager or manually by cloning the repository into the custom_nodes folder.
How can users use the example workflow for ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor?
Users can use the example workflow by downloading 'workflow_lama.json' and dropping it into a ComfyUI tab.
What is the current issue with an empty prompt in the drawing/cartoon outpainting system?
An unusual behavior is observed when providing an empty prompt to the drawing/cartoon outpainting system. It seems to give better results when prompted with 'positive' and 'negative' respectively.
What is the next step in improving consistency for unique in/outpaint results?
The next step in improving consistency for unique in/outpaint results is to investigate and apply a color fix method.
What inspiration was used for the creation of ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor?
